text:
Hi,

It would be nice that the standard JMS properties can be set in JMS Publisher and JMS Point-to-Point sampler. 

JMSExpiration and JMSPriority are already on the GUI as dedicated fields, but JMSType (usually used for message routing) or JMSCorrelationID (usually used in asynchronous communication to find request for response) are not. These are important properties in the standard.

I've set JMSType on the GUI as JMS Property, but it will be a dynamic message property.
creator: nagycsol@gmail.com

text:
HI ,

can you please help to configure JMSType and JMSCorrelationID for JMS Point-to-Point sampler.
creator: chennupatiharikrishna@gmail.com
